Description:
Detects potential DLL sideloading of "DbgModel.dll"

Author: Gary Lobermier
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Potential DLL Sideloading Of DbgModel.DLL
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (image_loaded like '%\dbgmodel.dll' and  not (image_loaded like 'c:\windows\system32\%' or image_loaded like 'c:\windows\syswow64\%' or image_loaded like 'c:\windows\winsxs\%') and  not (image_loaded like 'c:\program files\windowsapps\microsoft.windbg_%' or (image_loaded like 'c:\program files (x86)\windows kits\%' or image_loaded like 'c:\program files\windows kits\%')))
